values.description:
The Gatwick Diamond Initiative is an economic partnership free to businesses.   Business leaders work with the local authorities and government agencies to address the economic needs of the area to ensure it is a world class place to do business.   

In 2003, the Gatwick Diamond Initiative started when businesses got together to recognise the economic strengths of the area by creating an identity, calling it the Gatwick Diamond. The ‘Gatwick Diamond’ is not trademarked and can be used by any business in the area. The Gatwick Diamond encompasses the council areas of Epsom & Ewell, Mole Valley, Reigate & Banstead, Crawley, Horsham, Mid Sussex and Tandridge.

The Gatwick Diamond Initiative lobbies government and the public sector on issues that prevent businesses in the area from growing; we encourage international trade; we promote, attract and help UK and foreign inward investors looking to locate in the area; we campaign on issues ; we encourage the three FE colleges at Redhill, Crawley and Epsom to work together with the University of Brighton and University of the Creative Arts to provide a greater Higher and Further Education offer that meets business needs; and we send out press releases and strong messages about how great an area the Gatwick Diamond is to live and work in.   The Gatwick Diamond Initiative is also a part of the government sponsored Coast to Capital Local Enterprise Partnership.
values.name: The Gatwick Diamond Initiative Ltd

values.name: City Central Realty, LLC
values.description: From Back Bay to Brighton, the South End to Allston, City Central Realty, LLC has the keys to move you where you'd like to be. Whether you're a student new to the city or a professional looking for an upgrade, our experienced staff can guide you through the rental or buying process with ease.

At ThirdWay Interiors, our customers are at the heart of our business. It’s the reason why all our business to date has come to us through recommendation. We know we are only as good as our last job and that’s why we are committed to making every client our next glowing reference.
From our office on St John’s Lane, EC1, we pride ourselves on only working with the right people. For us it’s not about the size or value of the project, but in choosing the right projects that allow us to deliver the best office environment possible.
Our specialities lie in projects ranging from 500 sq ft upwards and contract values between £15,000 and £3,000,000. We deliver design led fixed price contracts, a unique top down project management approach and a commitment to providing quality, style and creativity.
Most of our customers tend to be based in London and the South East, but we’re happy to go wherever our customers want us to! We’ve been as far north as Aberdeen and as far south as Brighton.
values.name: ThirdWay Interiors Ltd
The Heights, Inc.
values.description: The Heights, Boston College’s independent student newspaper, is both editorially and financially independent from Boston College. The Heights serves the students, faculty, and staff of the Boston College community as well as our neighbors in Allston-Brighton.

The Oceana Ballroom is one of the most elegant and professional private events venues in Brooklyn. A multi-purpose 20,000 s.f. hall, right near Brighton Beach, the Oceana Ballroom is the most updated Landmark Hospitality venue in Brooklyn. When planning life’s most memorable events, we invite you to share your special day with your guests at Brooklyn’s best-kept secret.

Upon arrival your guests are swept up our red carpet and guided through our enchanting lobby. Followed by our glass entryway, The Oceana Ballroom’s grand ballroom boasts 30’ hand-painted ceilings, expandable interiors, gilded gold columns and crystal chandeliers, offering your guests a feeling of grandeur and opulence.
With numerous menu choices expertly crafted by our Executive Chef, we have endless options to cater to every budget.

Our professional Event Specialists understand exactly what is needed to flawlessly execute your event, and are fully equipped to provide a full range of event planning services. From choosing the décor, planning the menu, detailing logistics, equipment rental and vendor coordination, our results will be beyond your expectations.
values.name: Oceana Ballroom

Rotary District 9800
values.description:
Rotary is a worldwide organization of more than 1.2 million business, professional, and community leaders from more than 200 countries & geographical areas. Rotarians dedicate their time, energy & passion as well as provide humanitarian service, encourage high ethical standards in all vocations, and help build goodwill and peace in the world. 

Rotary Clubs are nonpolitical, nonreligious, and open to all cultures, races, and creeds. As signified by the motto Service Above Self, Rotary’s main objective is service by uniting leaders from all continents, cultures, and occupations to exchange ideas and take action in communities around the world.

By turning conversations into actions, connecting like minded people & partnering both business & community organisations, Rotarians for over a 100 years have accepted the challenges of tackling the worlds most pressing humanitarian needs. Important projects are undertaken in peace & conflict resolution, disease prevention & treatment, water & sanitation, maternal & child health, basic education & literacy & economic & community development.

Rotary District 9800 is in Victoria & a small part of New South Wales, Australia. It covers part of the Melbourne Metropolitan area, stretching into the north-west to include Bendigo, and reaching as far north as Echuca on the Murray. It is approximately 250km north to south and approximately 120km west to east at its widest point. Currently there are 70 Clubs, each meeting weekly with memberships ranging from 12 to over 200. 

It is the area in Victoria surrounded by and including the shires of and cities of Rochester, Huntly, Marong, Maldon, Newstead, Daylesford and Glenlyon, Kyneton, Bacchus Marsh, Werribee, Altona, Williamstown, Port Melbourne, South Melbourne, St. Kilda, Brighton, Caulfield, Malvern, Gisborne, Newham and Woodend, McIvor and Waranga plus that part of the Shire of Deakin, New South Wales, within a twenty-kilometre radius of the Echuca post office.

From custom designed, eye catching websites to business cards that will end up in your wallet and not in the trash, we do it all! We know the web and we know it can be intimidating. That's why we're with you from day one to design, create and educate you on the tools that will help grow your business and attract new customers. You don't run a cookie cutter business, so why settle for a cookie cutter marketing approach and website? Well, you don't have to anymore.

lomokev PLC
values.description:
I am not what most people would consider to be an average photographer. Armed with a selection of compact film cameras, I never leave home without one and I am always ready to capture anything that happens around me.

In October 2008 my first solo book Hot Shots was released in the UK, it sold out its UK and US print runs in under a year.  It is an instructional book for everyday people and is intended to help them sex up their photography, without being too bogged down in technical jargon.

I now teach a Photography course based around the book, I run the course from Brighton but it has also taken place in beautiful sea side towns of San Francisco and Hastings. Read more about the course here.

I have also had work published in two Lomo photographic books, one called “Spirit” and the other, “Don’t Think Just Shoot.” My work has also featured in a range of publications including Photo Pro Magazine, DSLR user magazine, Olympus User Magazine, Russian Esquire, Sonntagszeitung, and the BBC news website. I was a regular contributor to JPG magazine from when it first launched in 2005. In 2006 I was on the panel of judges in New York for flickr.com’s “Blink of the Eye” photo competition and judged again in 2008 for pixish.com’s “The SXSW Gallery Show” competition. I work commercially as a photographer for a range of different clients which have included Phillips, The Times, The Commonwealth Games 2002, Dr Martens, Stomp and Imogen Heap.

Links Creative is a full service web agency helping ambitious organisations plan, design and develop high performance websites and online workflow systems to maximise growth and profitability. We are a team of designers, developers, marketeers and digital consultants based in Brighton , UK.
values.name: Links Creative

values.description:
tilt is a multi-disciplined digital agency based in the heart of Brighton. We have a closely integrated team of highly talented individuals whose experience spans many disciplines as well as many sectors. We believe the old style agency model doesn’t work as well as it should, so to stay ahead of the curve, we need to be relatively small and flexible; ensuring that we can best meet your needs.

Our Philosophy
Here’s one simple rule about Tilt: if you can’t make good stuff, you can’t work here. We simply do not employ people who do not have a creative background. We believe that every aspect of an agency’s work MUST be creative in some way (well, perhaps with the exception of the accounting). We need project managers. But we need Project Managers who are sensitive to the creative process. We need Account Directors – but not just Account Directors who care about the bottom line. 

Maybe we’re naïve but this is what we believe: If you put creativity first, all the time, every time, it pays off. 

Our Capabilities
Here’s the tricky thing about digital – you need to be truly multi-disciplined to make it work. This is where we believe Tilt excels. We create integrated experiences and open channels for conversations that keep humans connected to brands. We develop holistic platforms and ecosystems that help brands become a lovable part of their audience’s everyday lives and we believe these solutions are great value for money.
values.name: tilt
Heath's Window Cleaning
values.description: ‘We Arrive On Time, Every Time! Dont waste another minute searching for a window cleaner who doesn't care about your time. Does your current window cleaner; arrive on time? Provide a No Hassle, Money Back Guarantee? Provide an obligation FREE Quote? Provide an up-front price before starting work? Allow you to book on line?
